newsitem.title: INDIA: Indian castor prices rise on low arrivals.
newsitem.headline: Indian castor prices rise on low arrivals.

text.p: Indian castorseed March delivery prices on Friday rose to 1,181/1,182 rupees from 1,176/1,177 rupees on fresh speculative buying, dealers said.
"Export enquiries for castoroil were low but reports of lower than expected arrivals at the producing centres kept operators active," one dealer said.
Groundnut oil was steady at 343/344 rupees per 10 kg amid limited arrivals of 70/80 tonnes while physical buying was low.
In Rajkot spot oil was steady at 520/525 rupees per 15 kg.
